original_text: and the priest shall examine the diseased area on the skin of his body. And if the hair in the diseased area has turned white and the disease appears to be deeper than the skin of his body, it is a case of leprous disease. When the priest has examined him, he shall pronounce him unclean.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 피부의 병을 진찰할지니 환부의 털이 희어졌고 환부가 피부보다 우묵하여졌으면 이는 나병의 환부라 제사장이 그를 진찰하여 그를 부정하다 할 것이요
